DataElement.preferredName: Progressive Disease Three Month Post Anti-GD2 Monoclonal Antibody Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Treatment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator for question which is asking if patient had progression/relapse within 3 months of receiving anti-GD2 therapy

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Progressive Disease Recurrent Disease Patient Three Month Post Anti-GD2 Monoclonal Antibody Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Any monoclonal antibody that is directed against the GD2 (GD-2) antigen._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity._The return of a disease after a period of remission._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity.:The return of a disease after a period of remission.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.
The return of a disease after a period of remission.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Three Month Post Anti-GD2 Monoclonal Antibody Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:Any monoclonal antibody that is directed against the GD2 (GD-2) antigen.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Any monoclonal antibody that is directed against the GD2 (GD-2) antigen.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
